Class SpringBootMockMvcBuilderCustomizer

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.webmvc.test.autoconfigure.SpringBootMockMvcBuilderCustomizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
MockMvcBuilderCustomizer
public class SpringBootMockMvcBuilderCustomizer extends Object implements MockMvcBuilderCustomizer
MockMvcBuilderCustomizer for a typical Spring Boot application. Usually applied automatically through @AutoConfigureMockMvc, but may also be used directly.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Phillip Webb, Andy Wilkinson, Moritz Halbritter
